plot: 'Krapova poslednja traka' is the televised version of Ljuba Tadic's one-man interpretation of Samuel Beckett's quintessential play.
title: Poslednja Krapova traka
plot_es: 'Krapova poslednja traka' is the televised version of Ljuba Tadic's one-man interpretation of Samuel Beckett's quintessential play.
plot_en: 'Krapova poslednja traka' is the televised version of Ljuba Tadic's one-man interpretation of Samuel Beckett's quintessential play.
